## Security Checklist

<!-- For a fintech application, security is critical -->

- [ ] No secrets, API keys, or credentials in the code
- [ ] Input validation implemented where applicable
- [ ] SQL queries use parameterization (no string concatenation)
- [ ] Sensitive data is encrypted/masked in logs
- [ ] Authentication/authorization checks in place
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced

## Compliance Checklist

<!-- If changes affect financial or user data -->

- [ ] Changes comply with PCI-DSS requirements (if applicable)
- [ ] GDPR considerations addressed (if handling EU user data)
- [ ] Audit logging added for sensitive operations
- [ ] Data retention policies respected
